qas.question: At what time was Secunderabad an important sport center?
What type of racing is the Hyderabad Race Club popular for?
What organization holds the TSD Rally?
Under whom did the Secunderabad Club and the Nizam Club form?
Which annual derby is held at the Hyderabad Race Club?

context: <a0_0>During British rule<a0_0/>, Secunderabad became a well-known sporting centre and many race courses, parade grounds and polo fields were built.:18 Many elite clubs formed by <a3_0>the Nizams and the British<a3_0/> such as the Secunderabad Club, the Nizam Club and the Hyderabad Race Club, which is known for its <a1_0>horse racing<a1_0/> especially the annual <a4_0>Deccan derby<a4_0/>, still exist. In more recent times, motorsports has become popular with the <a2_0>Andhra Pradesh Motor Sports Club<a2_0/> organising popular events such as the Deccan ¼ Mile Drag, TSD Rallies and 4x4 off-road rallying.
